item.description: Canada prepares to bowl against a formidable South African pace attack in their World Cup match, seeking to make a mark on the global stage.

item.title: Ellis Backs Australia's Pace Depth to Cover Big-Name Absences
item.description: Australia's pace attack remains formidable despite the absence of key players, says fast bowler Nathan Ellis ahead of the World Cup.
